item.title: Dickie The Explorer In The Land Of Amber
item.description: Amber has been loving all the special adult games her daddy has been teaching her, and tonight 'Dickie the Explorer' is going deep into her little pink cave.

item.title: Spanking Amber
item.description: A father's attempts to discipline his young daughter end up turning into an incestuos sexual lieasion, much to the surptrise of them both.

item.title: Darla'a Big Break, Part 1C
item.description: 15 year old Robbie become the perfect tutor/lover for his 8 year old sister Darla, and although he teaches her many things, he draws the line at vaginal penetration. Darla would not meekly accept this however, and as this chapter closes our little heroine forces a confrontation that doesn't go quite as she had planned.
